comments.author: Chris Smith's completely uniqu
comments.message: I'm writing this from the 'big room' in the LA Convention Center.If you don't know, PDC is a HUGE conference

comments.author: Joe Hummel
comments.message: Excellent excellent PDC talk!  If people missed it, worth viewing the recording...  Someone has finally presented F# as it should be, i.e. in a functional way, not as yet another .NET language.  Thanks Luca.

comments.author: Petr Lepilov
comments.message: Thank you very much! This was the one of the best sessions on PDC

comments.author: ricky
comments.message: Thanks for the excellent and funny talk Luca!
